# layers

**Instance Property**

Layer(s) to contain the composited video frames. Frames are duplicated if there is more than one layer.

## Declaration

```swift
var layers: [CALayer]
```

## Inspecting the configuration

- **containingLayer**: Containing layer to be rendered into, producing the final frame.
